item.title: Theories of Management
item.description: Classical Theories Scientific Management (?) people - emphasizes on Need for developing a scientific way of performing each job Training and preparing workers to perform that particular job Establishing harmonious relations between management and workers so that job is performed in a desired way Steps Involved: Develop a science for each element of the job to replace old rule of methods Scientificially select employees and train them to do the job as described Supervise employees to make sure they follow the prescribed methods Continue to plan the work but use workers to actually get the work done Two Managerial processes emerged from Taylor’s approach to management
